text: phir jab tum araqaane haj baja la chuko to tum is tarah zikre khuda karo jis tarah tum apane baap daadaon ka zikr karate ho balki usase badh kar ke phir baaz log aise hain jo kahate hain ki ai mere paravaradigaar hamako jo (dena hai) duniya hee mein de de haalaaki (phir) aakhirat mein unaka kuchh hissa nahin
